title: Speedrunner
desc:
*1 in 7.5 trillion! New world record!*

This monster makes up for its low damage by stunning you with every other attack, effectively letting it hit you twice per turn. However, because it stuns you, your other status effects will deplete more rapidly.

It always drops armor that provides stun immunity, which will make future Speedrunner encounters much less damaging. However, only a small handful of other monsters are capable of stunning you.

Naturally, it's wearing its own equipment, so you can't stun it either.
